01_basename_social_dropdown.title: Create a Basename Profile Component
01_basename_social_dropdown.description: Learn how to create a component that displays social media and profile information for a given basename.
01_basename_social_dropdown.author: hughescoin

0_accept-crypto-payments.title: Accept Crypto Payments
0_accept-crypto-payments.description: Configure your app to accept crypto payments with Coinbase Commerce and OnchainKit.
0_accept-crypto-payments.author: eric.base.eth

0_deploy-with-foundry.title: Deploying a smart contract using Foundry
0_deploy-with-foundry.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a smart contract on the Base test network using Foundry. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
0_deploy-with-foundry.author: neodaoist

0_deploy-with-hardhat.title: Deploying a smart contract using Hardhat
0_deploy-with-hardhat.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a smart contract on the Base test network using Hardhat. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
0_deploy-with-hardhat.author: taycaldwell

0_deploy-with-remix.title: Deploying a smart contract using Remix
0_deploy-with-remix.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a smart contract on the Base test network using Remix IDE. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
0_deploy-with-remix.author: briandoyle81

0_deploy-with-tenderly.title: Deploying a smart contract using Tenderly
0_deploy-with-tenderly.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy smart contracts using Tenderly DevNets. This page covers setup, debugging, transaction simulations, and continuous integration for smart contract development on Base Network.
0_deploy-with-tenderly.author: tenderly

0_deploy-with-thirdweb.title: Deploying a smart contract using thirdweb
0_deploy-with-thirdweb.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy and interact with smart contracts using the thirdweb CLI and SDK. Includes instructions for project creation, contract deployment on the Base test network.
0_deploy-with-thirdweb.author: taycaldwell

0_gasless-transactions-with-paymaster.title: Gasless Transactions on Base using a Paymaster
0_gasless-transactions-with-paymaster.description: Learn how to leverage the Base Paymaster for seamless, gasless transactions on the Coinbase Cloud Developer Platform.
0_gasless-transactions-with-paymaster.author: hughescoin

0_intro-to-providers.title: Introduction to Providers
0_intro-to-providers.description: A tutorial that teaches what providers are, why you need one, and how to configure several providers and use them to connect to the blockchain.
0_intro-to-providers.author: briandoyle81

0_run-a-base-node.title: Running a Base Node
0_run-a-base-node.description: A tutorial that teaches how to set up and run a Base Node.
0_run-a-base-node.author: taycaldwell & wbnns

1_10_farcaster-frames-hyperframes.title: Farcaster Frames: Building HyperFrames
1_10_farcaster-frames-hyperframes.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make cross-linked HyperFrames in an organized manner.
1_10_farcaster-frames-hyperframes.author: briandoyle81

1_1_coinbase-smart-wallet.title: Coinbase Smart Wallet
1_1_coinbase-smart-wallet.description: Learn to create an app that uses the Coinbase Smart Wallet and effectively manages assets and permissions for both native and new users of onchain apps
1_1_coinbase-smart-wallet.author: briandoyle81

1_2_smart-wallet-and-eoa-with-onchainkit.title: Use the Coinbase Smart Wallet and EOAs with OnchainKit
1_2_smart-wallet-and-eoa-with-onchainkit.description: Learn how to use OnchainKit to easily handle the Coinbase Smart Wallet and EOA wallets including the Coinbase wallet, at the same time.
1_2_smart-wallet-and-eoa-with-onchainkit.author: briandoyle81

1_3_smart-wallet-and-rainbowkit.title: Coinbase Smart Wallet with RainbowKit
1_3_smart-wallet-and-rainbowkit.description: Learn how to configure RainbowKit to elegantly handle the Coinbase Smart Wallet and EOA wallets including the Coinbase wallet, at the same time.
1_3_smart-wallet-and-rainbowkit.author: briandoyle81

1_4_farcaster-frames-nft-minting.title: Farcaster Frames: Building an NFT airdrop Frame
1_4_farcaster-frames-nft-minting.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make a Farcaster Frame that allows you to mint and airdrop NFTs to users.
1_4_farcaster-frames-nft-minting.author: briandoyle81

1_5_farcaster-frames-nocode-minting.title: Farcaster Frames: Building a no-code minting Frame
1_5_farcaster-frames-nocode-minting.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make a Farcaster Frame with an outbound link to an NFT minting website.
1_5_farcaster-frames-nocode-minting.author: briandoyle81

1_6_farcaster-frames-deploy-to-vercel.title: Farcaster Frames: Deploying to Vercel
1_6_farcaster-frames-deploy-to-vercel.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a Farcaster Frame using Vercel.
1_6_farcaster-frames-deploy-to-vercel.author: briandoyle81

1_7_farcaster-frames-gating-and-redirect.title: Farcaster Frames: Gating content and creating redirects
1_7_farcaster-frames-gating-and-redirect.description: A tutorial that teaches how to create Frames with more advanced behaviors such as gating content based on a user's follows, likes, or recasts, and creating redirect buttons.
1_7_farcaster-frames-gating-and-redirect.author: briandoyle81

1_8_farcaster-frames-transactions.title: Farcaster Frames: Making transactions
1_8_farcaster-frames-transactions.description: A tutorial that teaches how to invoke a wallet transaction from a Farcaster Frame.
1_8_farcaster-frames-transactions.author: briandoyle81

1_9_farcaster-cast-actions-simple.title: Farcaster Cast Actions: Create a Simple Cast Action
1_9_farcaster-cast-actions-simple.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make a simple Farcaster cast action.
1_9_farcaster-cast-actions-simple.author: briandoyle81

1_ock-swap-theme.title: Create a Custom Themed Swap Component with OnchainKit
1_ock-swap-theme.description: Learn how to implement a swap component with a custom theme using OnchainKit in your React application.
1_ock-swap-theme.author: hughescoin

1_smart-wallet-spend-permissions.title: Create Onchain Subscription Payments with Spend Permissions
1_smart-wallet-spend-permissions.description: Implement a smart wallet signer for a subscription payment application.
1_smart-wallet-spend-permissions.author: hughescoin

1_verify-contract-with-basescan.title: Verify a Smart Contract using Basescan API
1_verify-contract-with-basescan.description: A tutorial that teaches how to verify a smart contract using Basescan APIs.
1_verify-contract-with-basescan.author: hughescoin

2_1_simple-onchain-nfts.title: Simple Onchain NFTs
2_1_simple-onchain-nfts.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make simple nfts that are procedurally generated and have onchain metadata and images.
2_1_simple-onchain-nfts.author: briandoyle81

2_2_complex-onchain-nfts.title: Complex Onchain NFTs
2_2_complex-onchain-nfts.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make complex nfts that are procedurally generated and have onchain metadata and images.
2_2_complex-onchain-nfts.author: briandoyle81

2_3_signature-mint.title: Signature Mint NFT
2_3_signature-mint.description: A tutorial that teaches how to create a signature mint, in which minters pay their own gas, but must first be given a valid signed authorization.
2_3_signature-mint.author: briandoyle81

2_9_1_build-with-thirdweb.title: Building an onchain app using thirdweb
2_9_1_build-with-thirdweb.description: A tutorial that teaches how to build an NFT gallery app using thirdweb, including steps for creating an NFT collection, minting NFTs, and configuring the app for the Base testnet.

2_9_2_thirdweb-unreal-nft-items.title: Thirdweb and Unreal - NFT Items
2_9_2_thirdweb-unreal-nft-items.description: Learn how to use NFTs as in-game items using Thirdweb and Unreal.

2_dynamic-nfts.title: Building dynamic NFTs
2_dynamic-nfts.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make dynamic NFTs that evolve based on onchain or offchain actions.

2_email-campaign-with-resend.title: Create Email Marketing Campaigns Onchain using Coinbase Smart Wallet + Resend
2_email-campaign-with-resend.description: A tutorial that teaches how to create a mailing list and email customers using Resend
2_email-campaign-with-resend.author: hughescoin

2_event-gate-nouns.title: Gate IRL Events with Nouns
2_event-gate-nouns.description: Learn how to gate entry to an IRL event for members of a Nounish DAO.
2_event-gate-nouns.author: briandoyle81

2_nft-minting-with-zora.title: How to Mint on Zora with an App
2_nft-minting-with-zora.description: Learn to use Zora contracts inside your app to create secure, efficient, and feature-rich minting experiences for your users.

2_ock-checkout-tutorial.title: Build a eCommerce App using Coinbase Commerce and OnchainKit
2_ock-checkout-tutorial.description: Learn how to integrate Coinbase Commerce payments into your application using OnchainKit.
2_ock-checkout-tutorial.author: hughescoin

2_ock-fund-tutorial.title: Build a Smart Wallet Funding app with OnchainKit
2_ock-fund-tutorial.description: Learn how to create an app that detects if a smart wallet has ETH and prompts users to add funds if needed.

2_paymaster-erc20-gas-payments.title: Enable ERC-20 Gas Payments with Coinbase Paymaster
2_paymaster-erc20-gas-payments.description: Learn how to enable ERC-20 tokens as gas payment options for smart wallets using Coinbase Paymaster, improving UX and onboarding for your onchain application.
2_paymaster-erc20-gas-payments.author: hughescoin

2_paymaster-sponsor-using-wagi.title: How to Implement Base Paymaster into a Wagmi Project
2_paymaster-sponsor-using-wagi.description: A tutorial to create a Mint button for free NFT minting with Base Paymaster sponsorship

4_account-abstraction-with-biconomy.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Biconomy
4_account-abstraction-with-biconomy.description: A tutorial that teaches how to implement Account Abstraction into a Base project using Biconomy paymasters, bundlers, and smart accounts.

4_account-abstraction-with-particle-netw.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Particle Network
4_account-abstraction-with-particle-netw.description: A walkthrough on Particle Network's Modular Smart Wallet-as-a-Service, leveraging account abstraction and social logins across various providers.

4_account-abstraction-with-privy-and-bas.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Privy and the Base Paymaster
4_account-abstraction-with-privy-and-bas.description: A tutorial that teaches how to implement Account Abstraction into a Base project using Privy and the Base paymaster.
4_account-abstraction-with-privy-and-bas.author: Brian Doyle and Aaron Hayslip

4_hardhat-debugging.title: Hardhat: Debugging smart contracts
4_hardhat-debugging.description: A tutorial that teaches how to debug your smart contracts using Hardhat.

4_hardhat-profiling-gas.title: Hardhat: Optimizing the gas usage of smart contracts
4_hardhat-profiling-gas.description: A tutorial that teaches how to optimize the gas usage of your smart contracts using Hardhat.
4_hardhat-profiling-gas.author: Edson Alcala and Brian Doyle

4_hardhat-profiling-size.title: Hardhat: Optimizing the size of smart contracts
4_hardhat-profiling-size.description: A tutorial that teaches how to optimize the size of your smart contracts using Hardhat.
4_hardhat-profiling-size.author: Edson Alcala and Brian Doyle

4_hardhat-test-coverage.title: Hardhat: Analyzing the test coverage of smart contracts
4_hardhat-test-coverage.description: A tutorial that teaches how to profile the test coverage of your smart contracts using Hardhat and the Solidity Coverage plugin.
4_hardhat-test-coverage.author: Edson Alcala

4_intro-to-foundry-setup.title: Foundry: Setting up Foundry with Base
4_intro-to-foundry-setup.description: A tutorial that teaches how to set up your development environment to work with Foundry.
4_intro-to-foundry-setup.author: Edson Alcala

4_intro-to-foundry-testing.title: Foundry: Testing smart contracts
4_intro-to-foundry-testing.author: Edson Alcala
4_intro-to-foundry-testing.description: A tutorial that teaches how to test your smart contracts using Foundry.

5_basename-frames.title: Add Frames to A Basename
5_basename-frames.description: Learn how to customize your Basename by adding Frames, showcasing dynamic content with ease on Base.
5_basename-frames.author: hughescoin

5_cross-chain-with-ccip.title: Sending messages and tokens from Base to other chains using Chainlink CCIP
5_cross-chain-with-ccip.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Chainlink CCIP to perform cross-chain messaging and token transfers from Base Goerli testnet to Optimism Goerli testnet.

5_cross-chain-with-layerzero.title: Sending messages from Base to other chains using LayerZero V2
5_cross-chain-with-layerzero.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use LayerZero V2 to perform cross-chain messaging from Base Goerli testnet to Optimism Goerli testnet.

5_deploy-with-fleek.title: Deploy an Onchain App with Fleek
5_deploy-with-fleek.description: Learn how to deploy an onchain app using Fleek.
5_deploy-with-fleek.author: briandoyle81

5_farcaster-to-openframe.title: Convert Farcaster Frame to Open Frame using OnchainKit
5_farcaster-to-openframe.description: Learn how to convert your Farcaster Frame to an Open Frame using Onchain Kit, enabling broader compatibility and usage.

5_oracles-chainlink-price-feeds.title: Accessing real-world data using Chainlink Data Feeds
5_oracles-chainlink-price-feeds.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Chainlink Data Feeds to access real-world data, such as asset prices, directly from your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
5_oracles-chainlink-price-feeds.author: taycaldwell

5_oracles-pyth-price-feeds.title: Accessing real-time asset data using Pyth Price Feeds
5_oracles-pyth-price-feeds.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Pyth Price Feeds to access real-time asset data, directly from your smart contracts on the Base testnet.

5_oracles-supra-vrf.title: Generating random numbers contracts using Supra dVRF
5_oracles-supra-vrf.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Supra dVRF to serve random numbers using an onchain randomness generation mechanism directly within your smart contracts on the Base testnet.

5_shopify-storefront-commerce.title: Deploy a Shopify Storefront with Coinbase Commerce
5_shopify-storefront-commerce.description: Learn how to launch a Shopify storefront that uses Coinbase Commerce as a crypto payment gateway.
